start.welcome: 👋 Welcome to Claude Code Telegram Bot, {name}!
start.description: 🤖 I help you access Claude Code remotely through Telegram.
start.quick_start_2: Use `/cd <project>` to navigate to a project
start.quick_start_3: Send any message to start coding with Claude!
start.security_note: 🔒 Your access is secured and all actions are logged.
start.usage_note: 📊 Use `/status` to check your usage limits.

help.title: 🤖 **Claude Code Telegram Bot Help**
help.usage_file: Send a file to have Claude review it
help.file_ops_send: Send text files (.py, .js, .md, etc.) for review
help.file_ops_modify: Claude can read, modify, and create files
help.file_ops_security: All file operations are within your approved directory
help.tips_specific: Use specific, clear requests for best results
help.tips_buttons: Use quick action buttons when available

messages.language_select:
🌐 **Language Selection**

Please choose your preferred language:
messages.claude_unavailable:
❌ **Claude Integration Not Available**

The Claude Code integration is not properly configured. Please contact the administrator.
messages.action_failed:
❌ **Action Failed**

Failed to execute {action}. Please try again.

errors.quick_actions_unavailable:
❌ **Quick Actions Not Available**

Quick actions feature is not available.
errors.claude_not_available:
❌ **Claude Integration Not Available**

Claude integration is not properly configured.
errors.action_not_found:
❌ **Action Not Found**

Quick action '{action}' is not available.
errors.action_not_implemented:
⚠️ **Action Not Implemented**

This action is not fully implemented yet. Please try another action.
errors.action_error:
❌ **Action Error**

An error occurred while executing {action}: {error}
